broadcast(bytes32).notice: Broadcast the message to the bridge if it has not been broadcasted

depositFunds(bytes,bytes).notice: Function verifies the validity of the json. Then, the function retrieves the funds from the solver and store the source chainId into the orderCompleted mapping.
